entry.title: CFA Level 2 Á¨îËÆ∞Ôºà‰∏ÄÔºâ
entry.content: Quantitative Methods Linear regression Yi=b0+b1Xi+œµi,i=1,...,nY_i=b_0+b_1X_i+\epsilon _i, i=1,...,nYi‚Äã=b0‚Äã+b1‚ÄãXi‚Äã+œµi‚Äã,i=1,...,n ÔºåÊúÄÂêé‰∏Ä‰∏™Â≠óÊØçÊòØerror term‚Äî‚Äîthe portion of the dependent variable that cannot be explained by the independent variable„ÄÇb0b_0b0‚Äã Âíå b1b_1b1‚Äã ÊòØregression coefficients„ÄÇ ‰∏ÄËà¨‰ΩøÁî®Regression analysisÂ§ÑÁêÜ‰∏§Á±ªÊï∞ÊçÆÔºöcross-sectionalÂíåtime series„ÄÇ cross-sectional dataÔºömany observations on X and Y for the same time periodÔºõfrom different companies, asset classes, funds, people, etc time-series dataÔºöuse many observations from different time periods for the same company, funds, country or other entity.
